```Luau
function prvd.prvd(
	provider: Self
): Provider<Self>
```

Construct and returns a new provider. Providers *provide* specific functionality in a game.

## Parameters

<h3 class="prvdmwrong-api-param">
provider
<span class="prvdmwrong-api-type">: Self </span>
</h3>

The provider and associated properties itself.

## Returns

<h3 class="prvdmwrong-api-returns">
<span class="prvdmwrong-api-type"> Provider&lt;Self&gt; </span>
</h3>

A newly constructed provider.
